name: Lesbian Flirts
tag_list: lesbian-social, site, forums, chat, profiles, women, bisexual, free, dating, meet, network, networking, message
overview:
Lesbian Flirts is a social networking site for lesbian, bisexual and bi-curious women. Membership is 100% free. Features include personal profiles, photos, message forums, blogs, groups, live chat and more. Everything is designed to be simple so you can spend your time flirting with our members. It takes just a few minutes to join, create your profile and start mingling in our friendly online community for lesbian, bisexual and bi-curious women.

Let us get to know you! Make yourself a profile and then personalize it by adding your photo and adding profile information to tell other members as little or as much about yourself as you choose. Search for new women from your area or beyond to make exciting new lesbian friends. Join or create special interest groups and post messages in the group forums. Most of allâ€¦ just relax and have fun with the girls. Youâ€™re among friends here.
